item.title: Two Israeli hostages handed to Red Cross in Khan Younis
item.description: Ofer Kalderon, 53, and Yarden Bibas, 34, were taken during the 7 October attacks.

item.title: Venezuela frees six US men after Trump envoy meets Maduro
item.description: The move follows talks in Caracas between the Venezuelan leader and Trump official Richard Grenell.

item.title: Medical jet with six on board crashes into Philadelphia neighbourhood
item.description: The Learjet was carrying four crew, a child patient and the patient's escort when it crashed around 18:30 local time.

item.title: EU foreign policy chief says defence spending must rise
item.description: Kaja Kallas says Europe needs to increase investment to keep pace with threats facing the continent.

item.title: Canada 'will stand up to a bully', says PM contender Carney over Trump tariffs
item.description: The prime ministerial candidate responds to Donald Trump imposing 25% tariffs on Canada.
